title: Verify E2E test with conversational prompts
description:
## Objective

Run the existing FO-10 E2E test to verify the conversational prompt changes work correctly end-to-end.

## Spec Reference

**Spec:** `docs/projects/2026-02-09-fo-10/2026-02-09-fo-10-spec.md` — Section: "Testing Strategy"

## Scope

**Files to verify:**
- `e2e/fo-10.test.ts` — existing E2E test (no changes needed)

**What to verify:** The conversational prompt format produces contextually relevant chips that pass all existing E2E assertions.

## Implementation

1. Start dev server in background
2. Run E2E test: `node --import tsx e2e/fo-10.test.ts`
3. Verify test passes (all 15 steps complete)
4. Check dev server logs to confirm conversational Q&A format is being used
5. If test fails, investigate and fix issues in templates or server action

## Tests

Run E2E test:
```bash
npm run dev &
sleep 20
node --import tsx e2e/fo-10.test.ts
```

Do NOT close until acceptance criteria pass.
closed_reason: E2E test passes successfully. Verified conversational prompt format (Q&A strings) produces contextually relevant chips across all discovery steps (5-7). All 15 test steps completed: welcome flow, familiarity, 4 fixed questions with predefined/AI chips, 4 heart animations, affirmation generation (5 cards), card review (3 loved, 2 discarded), summary, post-review mockups, and completion screen. Server action confirmed to format conversation_history as 'Q: ... A: ...' strings as specified in spec.
